entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
